meanings.sent1: The children played with tiny mammets in the puppet show.
meanings.sent2: She collected vintage mammets from different countries.
meanings.sent3: The mammets seemed to have a secret conversation when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with mammets, each with its own unique personality.
meanings.sent5: The old puppeteer's hands moved the mammets with such skill and grace.

meanings.sent1: The artist sculpted intricate mammets out of clay.
meanings.sent2: The map had tiny mammets to show the locations of historical events.
meanings.sent3: The mammets on the board game came to life and started dancing around.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky looked like shimmering mammets on a dark canvas.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed ancient mammets that told stories of the past.
